item.title: I've Seen
item.author: me@silentsilas.com (Silent Silas)
item.description: I’ve seen tears fall From the face of a giant, A hint of desperation In the pleas of a king, An attempt to forgive The guilt-tripping violent, Their genuine surprise That neither learned a thing. The wishes of a mother Remain whispers in the wind, And the riches of the world In the words of humbled men.
